name: Bulletjumpers
body:
### BulletJumpers.
This is the page for a game, made by the fantastic group: LTG SPILUDVIKLINGSENTUSIASTER
It is a dystopian platforming shooter made in LUA using the fantastic engine LÃ¶ve2D. Credit where credit is due

### Playing the game
If you want to play this "Awesome" "game" simply follow these instructions
1 Download the project(As a .tar or a .zip)
2 Inside the folder you will find a subfolder, with a folder called love_binaries.
3 Inside love_binaries open game.exe
4 Revel in the beautiful composition of art that is: Bulletjumpers


### Developers
Our Project manager is @capt-glorypants

Currently @kagefadet is our lead graphic designer

Our programmer team currently includes:
+ @mrcpj1998
+ @capt-glorypants
+ @chregon2001
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
